professional_cleaning.title: PROFESSIONAL CLEANING
professional_cleaning.text: Naoussi Services is a professional and industrial cleaning company based in Douala. We serve both individuals and businesses with high-quality services.

maintenance_disinfection.title: MAINTENANCE & DISINFECTION
maintenance_disinfection.text: From regular interior and exterior cleaning to disinfection and pest control, we provide professional teams for impeccable results.

for_clients_businesses.title: SERVICES FOR INDIVIDUALS & BUSINESSES
for_clients_businesses.text: Whether you are an individual or a business, Naoussi Services adapts to your needs and supports all your cleaning requirements efficiently and professionally.

howItWorks.subtitle: How it Works
howItWorks.title: Naoussi Services Cleaning Journey
howItWorks.description: Naoussi Services provides professional and industrial cleaning solutions tailored to your needs, for both private and business clients.

steps.title: Schedule Your Cleaning
steps.description: Choose the service that fits your needs and schedule easily online or by phone. Fast and simple.

steps.title: Punctual and Reliable Service
steps.description: Our professional teams arrive on time, fully equipped to ensure a complete and efficient cleaning.

steps.title: Spotless Results
steps.description: We guarantee a clean, disinfected, and pleasant space for your home or business premises.

howItWorks.cta: Ready to transform your space? Trust Naoussi Services for fast, reliable, and professional cleaning. Contact us today for a personalized quote.

about.title: Your partner in professional cleaning.
about.desc: Naoussi Services specializes in professional and industrial cleaning, offering impeccable services for both individuals and businesses. From interior maintenance to disinfection and pest control, our team guarantees rigorous, reliable, and tailor-made service.
about.feature1.title: Qualified & reliable team
about.feature1.desc: Professionals trained to ensure flawless results.
about.feature2.title: Responsible methods & products
about.feature2.desc: Thoughtful cleaning that respects your space and the environment.
about.text2: Whether you need occasional cleaning or regular maintenance, our team adapts to your needs to offer you a clean, healthy, and pleasant environment every day.
identity.title: Vision, Mission & Values
identity.desc: Discover what drives us every day and the philosophy that guides Naoussi Services to provide impeccable quality and an exceptional customer experience.
identity.vision.title: Our Vision
identity.vision.desc: Become the benchmark for professional cleaning in Cameroon, setting a standard of excellence where every space reflects cleanliness, safety, and well-being.
identity.mission.title: Our Mission
identity.mission.desc: Provide reliable, meticulous, and innovative cleaning services through a qualified team and responsible methods tailored to each client's needs.
identity.values.title: Our Values
identity.values.desc: Professionalism, integrity, respect for the environment, and full commitment to customer satisfaction.
clean.title: Professional Cleaning Solutions
clean.desc: Naoussi Services, based in Douala, provides professional and industrial cleaning services for individuals and businesses. From daily maintenance to complete disinfection, our qualified team guarantees impeccable results and a healthy environment.
clean.service1.title: Residential Cleaning
clean.service1.desc: Keep your home spotless with our personalized cleaning services.
clean.service2.title: Commercial Cleaning
clean.service2.desc: Maintain a clean and welcoming workplace for your offices and commercial areas.
clean.service3.title: Industrial & Construction Cleaning
clean.service3.desc: Robust solutions for industrial sites and construction areas, ensuring efficient and safe cleaning.
clean.service4.title: Eco-Friendly Cleaning
clean.service4.desc: Non-toxic and environmentally friendly products for a clean and healthy space.
clean.service5.title: Disinfection & Pest Control
clean.service5.desc: Protect your spaces with our professional disinfection and pest control services.
clean.text2: We are committed to delivering quality service, combining efficiency, professionalism, and respect for the environment. Each intervention is adapted to your needs to ensure a clean, healthy, and welcoming space.

header.subtitle: Sparkling Homes and Offices
header.title: Professionally clean homes, every single time!

services.title: Professional Cleaning
services.description: Services tailored to the needs of individuals and businesses.

services.title: Industrial Cleaning
services.description: Cleaning solutions for industrial environments and factories.

services.title: Sale of Cleaning Products
services.description: Distribution of professional products for all your cleaning needs.

services.title: Home Cleaning
services.description: Regular cleaning services for homes and residences.

services.title: Office Cleaning
services.description: Daily or periodic maintenance of professional spaces.

services.title: Disinfection
services.description: Professional treatments against viruses and bacteria.

services.title: Rodent Control
services.description: Professional elimination of rodents and pests.

services.title: Insect Control
services.description: Treatment against all types of harmful insects.

services.title: Post-Construction Cleaning
services.description: Complete cleaning after construction or renovation.

services.title: Window and Floor Care
services.description: Professional cleaning of glass surfaces and flooring.

services.title: Green Space Maintenance
services.description: Mowing, trimming, and maintenance of gardens and outdoor areas.

paragraphs: We offer a complete range of cleaning products to ensure the hygiene and cleanliness of your spaces.
Our selection includes cleaning gels, scrubbing creams, bleach gels, and other high-quality cleaners.
We work with well-known brands such as Domestos, AKS, CIF, Maratem, and Mr Bee.

products.text: Brands: Domestos, AKS, CIF, Maratem, Mr Bee

contactSection.title: Contact Us
contactSection.description: Do you have a question or suggestion regarding Naoussi Service? Fill out the form below and we will respond quickly.
